workshoptitle: DBA Essentials - Manage Database Instance and Memory for Oracle Database 21c

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Prepare Setup
tutorials.description: How to download your ORM stack and update security rules for an existing VCN.

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Setup Compute Instance
tutorials.description: How to provision the workshop environment and connect to it

tutorials.title: Lab 3: Initialize Environment
tutorials.description: How to initialize and start all the workshop components.

tutorials.title: Lab 4: Shut down and Start up the Database Instance
tutorials.description: How to shut down and start up an Oracle instance using SQL commands and Oracle Enterprise Manager Cloud Control (Oracle EMCC).

tutorials.title: Lab 5: Manage Initialization Parameters
tutorials.description: How to to view and modify initialization parameters in Oracle Enterprise Manager Cloud Control (Oracle EMCC) to specify the properties of the Database Instance.

tutorials.title: Lab 6: Automatic Memory Management
tutorials.description: How to enable Automatic Memory Management for Oracle Database from Oracle Enterprise Manager CloudÂ Control (Oracle EMCC) and SQL command line.

tutorials.title: Need Help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to Common Problems and Directions for Receiving Live Help
